Text.val: 04.05.2012 SH SCR15870 Converted DSQL input parameter to alpha
10.01.2012 JOH SCR17038 Changed SQL selection on DEBC_level
23.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
01.07.2010 AK SCR15627 fixed bug in SQL in task : 'DEBC_Level'
04.02.2010 AK SCR15313 fixed bug in limits in foreign currencies

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select cast(max(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal(11,0)) MAX_CREDIT, cast(min(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT) as decimal(11,0)) MIN_CREDIT, cast(max(DEBC_FINANCELIMITH) as decimal(11,0))MAX_FIN, cast(min(DEBC_FINANCELIMIT) as decimal(11,0)) MIN_FIN, cast(max(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) as decimal(11,0)) MAX_REINS, cast(min(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) as decimal(11,0)) MIN_REINS, max(DEBC_REINSURANCELIMCURR) MIN_REINSCURR, max(DEBC_REINSURANCEGRADE) MAX_REINSGRADE, cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)) SUM_BALANCE from
( select DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC_FINANCELIMIT, DEBC_REINSURANCELIM, DEBC_REINSURANCELIMCURR, DEBC_REINSURANCEGRADE, DEBC_DATDELETED, DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE, case when DEBC_CREDITLIMIT is null then null else DEBC_CREDITLIMITH end as DEBC_CREDITLIMITH, case when DEBC_FINANCELIMIT is null then null else DEBC_FINANCELIMITH end as DEBC_FINANCELIMITH, CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO, DEBH_NO, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, DEBB_ACTINVAH from :1/DEBC join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO join :1/CLNT on DEBC_ADMNO=CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO=CLNT102_CLNTNO join :1/DEBH on DEBH_NO=DEBC_DEBH
where (DEBH_NO=:2 OR DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=:2) and CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO=:3 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO=:4 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null ) source

select cast(max(DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT) as decimal(11,0)) MAX_REF, cast(min(DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT) as decimal(11,0)) MIN_REF from ( select DEBH_NO, DEBH_DATDELETED, DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH from :1/DEBH where (DEBH_NO=:2 OR DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=:2) and DEBH_DATDELETED is null ) source

select DEBC_NO
from :1/DEBC join :1/CLNT on DEBC_ADMNO=CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO=CLNT102_CLNTNO join :1/DEBH on DEBH_NO=DEBC_DEBH
where (DEBH_NO=:2 OR DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=:2) and CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO=:3 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO=:4 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC_CREDITLIMITH=:5
